colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @067B (CES PA 'DI NI RIG GNAS LA RNAM DPYOD KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA P'A RAN KU SHRI T'A BLA MA LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS SNGA PHYIR NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, NYE CHAR BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA PHE KY'A BLA MA'I SPRUL PA'I SKU DPON SLOB RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG DPAL BZANG PO SOGS KYIS KYANG BSKUL MA MDZAD PAR BRTEN, ,SNYOMS LAS PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BKOD PA'O,, ,,SVA STI, ,TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA DO NANG PE SE'I SHOG ,DBYOD LDAN DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE BAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,LEGS BYAS 'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE BA'I MTUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR BRTEN BRGYUD DE, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SMON GROL LAM BZANG MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,)
